column2: "You're back! Have you decided which enemies we should base our desserts on?"

"Um, I've been working on the recipe!
...We're going to make some light, fluffy donuts, baked, not fried!"
"My mouth's watering just thinking about them! So, which enemies did you pick?"

"Yes, the donuts could be Anjhadu-lili wheels! And the oven to bake them...
A Vardha Soma cannon?!"
"...These desserts will definitely be unique! And since they're not fried, they're even healthier than usual! This is perfect, thank you!"
